basics.name: Anastasia
basics.title: Software Engineer based in Latvia
about: I began my journey as a developer in 2021 with Java and Spring Boot. Since then my tech stack has expanded to Typescript and React, some Python and even a touch of .NET.
I love to take on a challenge and I am not shying away from an unknowns. i am a maker at heart so thinking about the best solution for the problem at hand is my main driving force.
My experience in quality assurance gives me a unique perspective, I strongly believe that quality should be embedded into the code.
